serverSide.sharedRegions

Class GeneralRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • serverSide.sharedRegions.GeneralRepository

  • public class GeneralRepository
extends java.lang.Object
    General Repository It is responsible for logging the internal state of the problem in a file. It is a shared region.

    • Constructor Summary

      • setMatchWinner

        public void setMatchWinner(int[] scores)
        Set the match winner. matchWinner == 0 : team 0 wins. matchWinner == 1 : team 1 wins. matchWinner == 2 : draw.
        Parameters:
        scores - Scores of the match
